Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity to own an item that holds significant value to me and, I believe, will greatly benefit you as well. Given its worth, I'm offering it to you for $11000. This price reflects its high quality and the exclusivity it brings. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
